info.title: What happens next?
info.paragraph1: After submitting the form, you won’t receive an automatic quote or start any payment process. This isn’t a webshop — it’s the beginning of a conversation.
info.paragraph2: Every project is unique, so I’ll first review your needs. If I see that we’re a good fit, I’ll respond personally. That might be a short email or a quick call to clarify the details.
info.paragraph3: My goal isn’t to sell anything — it’s to build something that’s worthy of you and your brand. If that approach resonates with you, I’d be happy to hear from you.
